fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Banking and financial services, Migration and asylum, European Neighbourhood Policy, Fraud prevention
eu_initiatives: The next European elections: suggestions of programmatic lines to be tackled at EU level
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication:
A complete overview of our activities, publications and impact can be found here (only available in French and Dutch): 
https://www.v-g-v.be/fr/rassembler-les-radicaux/  
https://www.v-g-v.be/fr/the-future-is-yours-to-make/
legal_status: Project depended of the King Baudoin Foundation
goals__remit: The Friday group is a Belgian policy think tank for young people from various backgrounds financed by the King Baudoin Foundation. We publish reports and opinion pieces in Belgium's mainstream media, organise roundtables with key decision and opinion makers, and public conferences.
